song.title: Oh, How I Love Jesus
song.lyrics:
[1]There is a name I love to hear, I love to sing its worth; it sounds like music in my ear, the sweetest name on earth.
[C]Refrain: O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, because he first loved me!
[2]It tells me of a Savior's love, who died to set me free; it tells me of his precious blood, the sinner's perfect plea. [B] [Refrain]
[3]It tells of one whose loving heart can feel my deepest woe; who in each sorrow bears a part that none can bear below. [B] [Refrain]
